# c-list



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                       | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `bordered` | `bordered` | Show border arount the list items | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable the list                  | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                                         |
| ------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `--c-list-border-color`        | Border color of the list items when bordered        |
| `--c-list-border-color-active` | Border color of the active list items when bordered |
| `--c-list-gap`                 | Gap between list items                              |
